Oct. 5, 2013 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Championship Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-champion-5461
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Soprano (Haydn Stredwick Memorial Cup): Jayne Thomas (Burry Port) Best Instrumentalist: Gareth John, Eb Bass, Burry Port Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 6 bands competed.
March 3, 2013, 12:41 p.m. July 4, 2020, 12:23 p.m.
1 Tylorstown Band Gary Davies Fanfares and Love Songs
2 Burry Port Town Nigel Seaman Rococo Variations [Gregson]
3 Abergavenny Borough Band Chris Turner Trittico [Curnow]
4 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter Harmony Music
5 Markham and District Band Gareth Pritchard Chivalry
6 Pontardulais Town Band Paul Jenkins Equilibrium
